## Source: amazon-inspector (7f481c97f5f745c99eb45dfa9b3744087e80ec7ac13fe1fb4043ca0274c625c3)
The package karemm6 was found to contain malicious code.

## Source: ossf-package-analysis (d17f9161b68d61aa5f69d4d313d653d03c3256893ac716347d63dade604eea0c)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'karemm6' @ 1.0.0 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.

- The package executes one or more commands associated with malicious behavior.
